comment:
* A subclass of {@link HandwritingGesture} for deleting a range of text by defining start and end * rectangles. This can be useful when the range cannot be defined with a single rectangle. * This class holds the information required for deletion of text in * toolkit widgets like {@link TextView}. *

Note: this deletes text within a range between two given areas. To delete all text * within a single area, use {@link DeleteGesture}.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public int getGranularity()
methods.comment:
* Returns Granular level on which text should be operated.
     * @see #GRANULARITY_CHARACTER
     * @see #GRANULARITY_WORD

methods.name: public RectF getDeletionStartArea()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Deletion start area {@link RectF} in screen coordinates.
     *
     * Getter for deletion area set with {@link Builder#setDeletionStartArea(RectF)}.

methods.name: public RectF getDeletionEndArea()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Deletion end area {@link RectF} in screen coordinates.
     *
     * Getter for deletion area set with {@link Builder#setDeletionEndArea(RectF)}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     *
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
